name: Flickr - Black borders around photos
description:
Adds a black border around photos on Flickr photostream, set, and photo pages.

Changing the background color on Flickr pages tends to break the site visually (it looks bad!). Placing a thick border around images provides the same increased contrast for photos, making them look much better, without disrupting Flickr's layout.
additional_info:
30 Mar 2011: Update for Flickr's silent CSS changes
5 Aug 2010: Fix problem with other people's photostreams (all images would appear black)
5 Aug 2010: Updated for new Flickr photo pages. Reduced width of border in most places, tag/set/stat pages in particular
